biography: Anders, a familiar name to enthusiasts of the sport, hails from the esteemed Vihti Golf Club. Known for his calm demeanor on the course, Anders has a tactical mind and an unparalleled ability to read the greens.

With one past appearance at the Hector Trophée, Anders brings a wealth of experience to the greens, albeit his record might not fully reflect his capabilities. While he has never won the Hector Trophée nor secured a Victor Trophy, his consistent performance has earned him the respect of his peers.

It is believed that Anders has retired from participating in future Hector Trophée events, although the possibility of a surprising return should not be ruled out. His presence on the course is missed.
